name: online-point
description: Online Point is an online time clock system that offers an efficient and convenient solution for managing work hours. Allowing employees to clock in and out remotely, Online Point simplifies the attendance tracking process, providing an intuitive and accessible user experience. With features such as secure authentication, real-time time tracking, and detailed reporting capabilities, Online Point is the ideal choice for companies seeking a reliable and modern way to monitor their employees' work hours.
author: Alexandre Tonin
